
# Ctrl_Alt_Delinquents Python Project

## Project Overview
This is a Python "Hello World" starter project with the following structure:

## Python Environment

- Python 3.12.10
- Virtual environment: `.venv`
- Command to run Python: `C:/Users/tclark2/repos/Ctrl_Alt_Delinquents/.venv/Scripts/python.exe`

## How to Run
```powershell
.\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1
python src/main.py
```
